New Records: Steve Mouine equalized for Benin in the 50th minute
Junior Olaitan converted a penalty to give Benin the lead
Key Match Events: Libya took an early 1-0 lead with a penalty in the 9th minute
Benin scored again in the 62nd minute via a penalty
Post-Match Reflections: The victory helped Benin recover from their 1-0 loss to Nigeria
Libya's performance was noted as struggling despite an early lead
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match moved Benin to second place in Group D
Libya faced a crucial test with upcoming fixtures against Nigeria
